an4.239:1.1: “Mendicants, someone with four qualities is cast down to hell.
an4.239:1.3: Blameworthy deeds by way of body, speech, and mind, and blameworthy view.
an4.239:1.4: Someone with these four qualities is cast down to hell.
an4.239:2.1: Someone with four qualities is raised up to heaven.
an4.239:2.3: Blameless deeds by way of body, speech, and mind, and blameless view.
an4.239:2.4: Someone with these four qualities is raised up to heaven.”
